author: breser
msg: Formatting and logic fixes to r10132.
* subversion/clients/cmdline/prompt.c
(wait_for_input_or_timeout): Formatting fix and use the timeout argument.
(prompt): More formatting and improve the error handling logic.

author: jpieper
msg: Treat the hostname portion of URLs specially in svn_path_canonicalize
so that "/../" cannot backpath over it.
Patch by: Klaus Rennecke <kre@tigris.org>
(Test cases by me.)
* subversion/libsvn_subr/path.c
(svn_path_canonicalize): Copy over the hostname unmangled, so that
absolute_path is set correctly for URLs.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_subr/path-test.c
(test_canonicalize): Add some URLs into the test cases for
svn_path_canonicalize.

author: jpieper
msg: When using 'svn cp' or 'svn mv' on a special file, do not attempt to
actually copy the special file, instead retranslate it using
svn_subst_copy_and_translate2.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/copy.c
(copy_file_administratively): Check for special status when copying
the working copy file.  If special, use the translation routines
to create a new one rather than copying the existing file.

author: jpieper
msg: Issue #1779: Improve svn_path_canonicalize to make more
transformations aimed at removing path specification redundancies.
This does also remove double path separators, which were able to crash
'svn cp' because of inadequate checking in svn_path_split.
All libsvn_client functions are documented as taking any URL, so we
will keep that promise.  However, they should always operate on
canonicalized paths internally.  If there are any more uses of
non-canonicalized paths/URLs sneaking around they will be fixed in
another patch.
* subversion/include/svn_path.h
(svn_path_canonicalize): Document the new transformations that this
function is making.
(svn_path_join, svn_path_basename, svn_path_dirname,
svn_path_add_component, svn_path_remove_component,
svn_path_remove_component, svn_path_get_longest_ancestor,
svn_path_get_absolute, svn_path_split_if_file,
svn_path_condense_targets, svn_path_remove_redundancies,
svn_path_decompose): Document that canonicalized paths are required
as input to these functions.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/path.c
(discount_trailing_slash): Removed since svn_path_canonicalize uses
a more sophisticated approach to removing redundancies and no
longer needs it.  No other callers need it either, since
canonicalized URLs can't have this kind of redundancy internally.
(svn_path_remove_component, svn_path_dirname): Since canonicalized
paths are smarter now, we don't need to check for canonicalization
after our operation.
(svn_path_canonicalize): Replaced old implementation with new that
uses nearly identical logic to large portions of
apr_filepath_merge.  It differs from apr_filepath_merge in that it
handles URLs properly and does not access the OSs filesystem in
any way.  It condenses redundant "/./", "/../", and  "//" portions
of the path, as well as removing any trailing separator characters.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_subr/path-test.c
(test_path_split, test_basename, test_decompose): Remove tests that
pass non-canonicalized paths as arguments, since the docstrings
say they can't handle them.
(test_canonicalize): Test out of some the new canonicalization
features and remove the check for allocation.  It wasn't part of
the docstring, and the new routine can't generally tell if the
result will be identical without doing the whole transformation in
the first place.
* subversion/tests/clients/cmdline/externals_test.py
(disallow_dot_or_dotdot_directory_reference): Remove a test that
will pass after canonicalization is performed, since the actual
referenced directory is not the current one or backpathed from the
current.

author: breser
msg: Fix Issue #1916, allow people to interrupt/abort the client during a prompt.
* subversion/clients/cmdline/prompt.c
(wait_for_input_or_timeout): New function to poll for input to avoid
blocking.
(prompt): Add a ctx paramter to call it to get the cancel_func and
cancel_baton and call wiat_for_input_or_timeout().
(svn_cl__auth_simple_prompt,svn_cl__auth_username_prompt,
svn_cl__auth_ssl_server_trust_prompt, svn_cl__auth_ssl_client_cert_prompt,
svn_cl__auth_ssl_client_cert_pw_prompt): Use the baton as a ctx and pass
it into prompt().
(svn_cl__prompt_user): Pass NULL when calling prompt() for the ctx parameter.
* subversion/clients/cmdline/main.c
(main): Use ctx as the baton for prompt_providers.
